resources.string:
GeoStripper is a tool that safeguards your geo-location privacy when sharing your photos online.

When you decide to share your photo via sms, email, a social network or a photosharing app, please select GeoStripper instead of your usual Gallery app.

GeoStripper will automagically determine a default gallery application and allow you to change that to a Gallery app of your choice.

Next time you use GeoStripper, it will seamlessly redirect you to the previously specified Gallery app.

Once you select a photo in that app, Geostripper will remove GPS location info from the photo on the fly without modifying the original file and then return that GPS-free photo back to the application which requested it.

Protect your Geo-privacy : use GeoStripper!

GeoStripper will use the gallery application specified below when you launch GeoStripper from your favorite sms, email, social networking, photo sharing or any application that allows you to select an image from your smartphones gallery next time.
